product_name: Sony Sony Action Cam Ball Head Mount
long_description: The Sony Action Cam ball head mount lets you shoot what you want and how you want when you couple it with your Sony wearable camcorder (sold separately). Triaxial adjustment allows for versatile shooting positions; use with the tilt adapter (sold separately) to securely adjust shooting position.
short_description: The Sony Action Cam ball head mount lets you shoot what you want and how you want when you couple it with your Sony wearable camcorder (sold separately).
